attributes.action: Redistribute constituency boundaries so each has an equal number of the electorate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the last General election a million votes for Labour created 37 MPS,a million for Conservative created 22 MPS,whilst a million votes for the Lib Dems created 10 MPS.

IS THIS FAIR?

Each constituency must contain a more equal number of the electorate.
